title: What's a simple way to cut two YouTube songs together? - Quora

response.answer_text: In your editor of choice, you’re going to load the two tracks into your timeline. They will make their own tracks and overlap. Then scrub them into the position you want. You’ll use the mouse/trackpad on most software, though in Avid it’s really cool to be able to use keyboard commands! Anyway, if you’re trying to make a mix, you’ll want to add a fade out/in on the audio tracks where one song starts and the next begins. Have fun!
